rg2 1.0

    • rg2 configuration

    rg2 configuration

    rg2-configuration.Rmd

    As you can see that all rg2 functions get a cfg parameter, it’s used for chart configuration. Almost all of the configurations can be set through cfg.

    title and description

    The title and description are invisible by default.

    a example to configure title and description:

    cfg = list(
  title = list(
    visible=TRUE, 
    text='title goes here'
  ),
  description = list(
    visible=TRUE, 
    text='this is the description text'
  )
)
g2Gauge(0.8, range=c(0,0.8,1), cfg = cfg)

    There are four configuration items that affect the title and description appearance of the plot:

    items typeof description
    visible logical whether to display, default to FALSE
    text character the text string
    alignTo character position, one of left, center right
    style list style: font-size, color, line, …

    Full configuration items of title and description:

    list(
  visible = TRUE,
  text    = 'title text',
  alignTo = 'left',
  style   = list(fontSize      = 12,
                 fill          = '#000000',   # or 'red'
                 stroke        = '#AEAEAE',
                 lineWidth     = 2,
                 lineDash      = 2,
                 opacity       = 2,
                 fillOpacity   = 2,
                 strokeOpacity = 2
            )
)

    theme

    rg2 has two themes: default and dark

    cfg = list(theme = 'dark')
g2Liquid(value=0.5, min=0, max=1, cfg=cfg)

    axis

    There are two kinds of axes: catergoryAxis and linearAxis in rg2.

    category axis

    xAxis of column chart and yAxis of bar chart are both category axis. The default configuration of category axis:

    cfg = list(
  xAxis = list(
    visible  = TRUE,
    grid     = list(visible = FALSE),
    line     = list(visible = TRUE),
    tickLine = list(visible = TRUE),
    label    = list(visible = TRUE,  autoRotate = TRUE, autoHide = TRUE),
    title    = list(visible = FALSE, offset = 12)
  )
)

    linear axis

    the yAxis of column and line chart are both linear axis, and also the xAxis of bar chart is linear axis. Linear axis has the following configuration items by default:

    cfg = list(
  xAxis = list(
    visible  = TRUE,
    grid     = list(visible = TRUE),
    line     = list(visible = FALSE),
    tickLine = list(visible = FALSE),
    label    = list(visible = TRUE),
    title    = list(visible = TRUE, offset = 12)
  )
)

    Full configuration items for axis:

    items typeof description
    visible logical
    type string specified with one of the following:
    linear
    time, dateTime
    cat, category, timeCat
    tickCount numeric
    tickInterval numeric
    min numeric
    max numeric
    line list items:
    - visible: logical
    - style：list of lineStyle
    grid list ietms:
    - visible: logical
    - style：list of lineStyle
    label list items:
    - visible: logical
    - formatter: javascript function
    - suffix: string
    - precision：numeric
    - offsetX: numeric
    - offsetY：numeric
    - style：list of textStyle - autoHide: logical
    - autoRotate: logical
    tickLine list items:
    - visible：logical
    - style: list of lineStyle
    title list items:
    - visible：logical
    - text: string
    - offset: numeric
    - style：list of textStyle

    legend

    The default configuration for legend:

    cfg = list(
  legend = list(
    visible  = TRUE,
    flipPage = TRUE,
    position = 'top'
  )
)

    Full configuration items for legend:

    items typeof description
    visible logical
    position string There are 12 position for legend:
    - top-left
    - top-center - top-right
    - bottom-left
    - bottom-center
    - bottom-right
    - left-top
    - left-center
    - left-bottom
    - right-top
    - right-center
    - right-bottom
    formatter function
    flipPage logical
    offsetX numeric offset base on position in px.
    offsetY numeric offset base on position in px.
    marker string Optional values:
    - circle (default)
    - square
    - diamond
    - triangle,
    - triangleDown
    - hexagon
    - bowtie
    - cross
    - tick
    - plus
    - hyphen
    - line
    - hollowCircle
    - hollowSquare
    - hollowDiamond

    label

    padding

    The padding margin order is the same as the CSS box model: c(top, right , bottom, left)

    cfg = list(
  padding = c(50, 50, 50, 50)
)

    cfg = list(
  padding = 'auto'
)

    state

    guideLine

    You can setup one or more guidelines at a time.

    cfg = list(
  guideLine = list(list(start = c('2010-01-01', 100),
                     end = c('2010-01-10', 50),
                     lineStyle = list(),
                     text = list()
                     ),
                list(start = c('0%','50%'),
                     end = c('100%','80%')),
                list(type = 'mean')
  )
)

    Full configuration items for guidline:

    items typeof description

    type string Type of guideline with statistical significance.
    Optional values: mean, median, min, max

    start vector Start position of guideline

    end vector end position of guideline

    lineStyle list line style of guideline

    text list text of guideline. Items:
    - position: string, The text position, optional values: start, center, end - content: string, The text - offsetX: number, offset of text in x axis - offsetY: number, Offset of text in y axis - style: list, The textStyle of the text You can specify type for standar guideline or specified both start and end for custom guideline.

    Two forms of configuration are supported on start and end and they cannot be mixed.

    • form 1(original data value): c('2010-01-01', 100), c(20, 25)
    • form 2(location percentage of plotted area): c('50%', '50%')

    tooltip

    The configuration of G2Plot are listed in the following pages:

    • components
